snippet: The San Francisco Giants parted ways with the left-handed pitcher Barry Zito, declining to exercise his $18 million contract option for next season.
abstract: San Francisco Giants part ways with left-handed pitcher Barry Zito, declining to exercise his $18 million contract option for next season and instead owing him a $7 million buyout; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Giants parted ways with the left-handed pitcher Barry Zito, declining to exercise his $18 million contract option for next season.

headline.main: Zito’s Tenure With Giants Is Over
headline.print_headline: Zito’s Tenure With Giants Is Over
